subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Sino-Tibetan: {{cog|bo|རུ་མ||curdled milk}}, {{cog|kac||ru<sup>31</sup>-|liquor}}. Similar-looking words in Tai-Kadai may be Han or post-Han loans; cf. {{cog|tai-pro|*ʰlawᶜ||liquor}} ({{cog|th|เหล้า}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|醪糟|醪醴|單醪|投醪|濁醪|醇醪}}
